Thank you for visiting www.zweler.com (the 'Website'), owned and operated by Zweler Gems Pvt Ltd ('Zweler', 'we', 'us', or 'our'). This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our Website. By accessing and using our services, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
returnBuy-two-content:
1.1 Personal Information: We may collect personally identifiable information ('Personal Information') that you provide voluntarily when registering an account, placing orders, or contacting us. Personal Information may include but is not limited to your name, email address, shipping address, and contact details.

1.2 Usage Data: We may collect non-personal information that does not directly identify you ('Usage Data'). Usage Data includes technical information about your device, browser type, IP address, and usage patterns on the Website.

1.3 Cookies and Similar Technologies: We use cookies and similar technologies to enhance your browsing experience. Cookies are small data files stored on your device that help us identify your preferences and improve our services. You can control cookies through your browser settings.
returnBuy-three-content:
2.1 Personalization: We may use your Personal Information to customize your experience on the Website, display personalized content, and recommend products based on your preferences.

2.2 Order Processing: We use your information to process and fulfill orders, track shipments, and communicate with you about your purchases.

2.3 Customer Support: We may use your information to respond to your inquiries, provide customer support, and address any issues you may encounter.

2.4 Marketing: With your consent, we may send you promotional offers, updates, and newsletters. You can opt-out of marketing communications at any time.

2.5 Legal Compliance: We may use your information to comply with legal obligations, enforce our Terms and Conditions, and protect our rights and the rights of others.
returnBuy-four-content:
3.1 Security Measures: We implement reasonable security measures to protect your Personal Information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

3.2 Data Retention: We retain your Personal Information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purposes for which it was collected and as required by applicable laws.
returnBuy-five-content:
4.1 Third-Party Service Providers: We may share your information with trusted third-party service providers who assist us in operating the Website, processing payments, and delivering goods.

4.2 Business Transfers: In the event of a merger, acquisition, or sale of assets, your information may be transferred to the acquiring entity.

4.3 Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information to comply with legal obligations, respond to government requests, or protect our rights and the rights of others.
